Because atorvastatin everolimus metabolism via Cytochrome P450 subfamily 3A4 , investigator make hypothesis patient receive everolimus atorvastatin change area time concentration curve everolimus .
DOC.detailed_description: Population : Thai postrenal transplantation recipient receive everolimus hypercholesterolemia posttransplantation clinic Faculty Medicine , Chulalongkorn University . Study Design : Experimental study , Two-sample crossover study Sample size calculation : N = 18 Primary outcome : 12-hour area time concentration curve everolimus Secondary outcome : renal function ( serum creatinine , creatinine clearance ) Method : 1 . Patients random everolimus everolimus atorvastatin 20 mg arm 1 month . 2 . Take blood sample everolimus concentration time 0,0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 12 hour 3 . After first blood sample , patient receive everolimus 1 month ( wash period ) 4 . Patients switch another arm eg.patient receive everolimus switch everolimus atorvastatin 20 mg 1 month 5 . Take blood sample everolimus concentration time 0,0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 12 hour 6 . Everolimus level analyse 12-hour AUC everolimus .
